riverguides.name: River Rat
riverguides.biography: River Rat is an expert adventurer and has lived outdoors for 30 years.

riverguides.name: Kayaking Kyle
riverguides.biography: Kayaking Kyle graduate from BYU Idaho 3 years ago and has enjoyed Kayaking the Salmon River for 3 years.

riverguides.name: Andy Adventure
riverguides.biography: Andy Adventure started working with us last year.  He is a novice but very excited to work with our team.
